article:
Holidays always make me happy. Today is the last day of my spring holiday, _ I decided to write something about it.
During the holidays, I like to play games with my friends, _ in the library and walk around in the park. Sometimes I _ some time playing with my younger sister.
 _ the first day of my spring holiday, my friend Brock and Kate came to my home for a party. We stayed up late that night and had lots of fun! The next morning, we all went outside and _ our bikes around. Brock tried to ride my sister's bike, but he was too _ !
A few days later, I went to play table tennis with Liam. I lost the game, but I still had lots of _ . After that I went to Liam's _ for his birthday party. We really enjoyed ourselves.
Yesterday my friend Kathleen came to my house. She is _ my sister's friend. We had a great time together. We played lots of interesting games.
